title: Adiyae Ivalaey Lyrics Romeo Juliet Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Romeo JulietÂ Adiyae Ivalaey Song Lyrics
Singer(s): Anthony Daasan
Lyrics: Karky
Music: D Imman

Adiyae Adiyae Ivalaey
yen vazhkka paalaakka
pirandhavaley

Adiyae Adiyae azhagae
enna venaanu
sollitu parandhavaley

ponnungala ellaam
kuththam solla maaten
nee mattum thaan mosam

nee illaama ponaa
aayiduven veenaa
vaadi enakkosam

arakki
unna unna unna marakka
sara sara sara sarakka
modha modha modha
oothi kudichaen.

kirukki
unna unna unna verukka
mudi mudiyala
adiye adi manasula
vembi vedichaen.

Adiyae Adiyae Ivalaey
yen vazhkka paalaakka
pirandhavaley

Adiyae Adiyae azhagae
enna venaanu
sollitu parandhavaley

thambulil
orupakkam illayina
yaarukkum udhavaadhudi

thread millil
kai vechi oda sonna
ennaala mudiyaadhudi

karlaa sulatti
unna naan veratti
un mandayila poda nenappen.

vizhiya urutti
ena nee miratta
kaalil vilundhu
thandaal eduppen.

midhichi ammaadi
nee ponaa
jim body thaangaadhu.

arakki
unna unna unna marakka
sara sara sara sarakka
modha modha modha
oothi kudichaen.

kirukki
unna unna unna verukka
mudi mudiyala
adiye adi manasula
vembi vedichaen.

Adiyae Adiyae Ivalaey
yen vazhkka paalaakka
pirandhavaley

Adiyae Adiyae azhagae
enna venaanu
sollitu parandhavaley

Neethane emmela
kadhalunu
yen pinnae suthi vandha

naanthaane unnoda
vazhkayinnu
ooorellaam kathi vandha.

purse-a paathuthaan
manasa thandhiyaa
kaasa paartha thaan
kadhal varumaa

usura mothamaa
uruvi poniye
en saabam unna
summaa vidumaa.

idhuku munnaala
hero naan
inimel un villain thaan.

Adiyae Adiyae Ivalaey
yen vazhkka paalaakka
pirandhavaley

Adiyae Adiyae azhagae
enna venaanu
sollitu parandhavaley
podu

arakki
unna unna unna marakka
sara sara sara sarakka
modha modha modha
oothi kudichaen.

kirukki
unna unna unna verukka
mudi mudiyala
adiye adi manasula
vembi vedichaen.
